excerpt: "The professional cloud services market was valued at USD 21.51billion in 2022 and is expected to reach a value of USD 57.54 billion by 2031, at a CAGR of 17.76 %, during the forecast period. The increase in the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) with a growing focus on digital transformation initiatives are expected to provide growth opportunities for cloud services market - Moreover,"
